  • Blip

Integrate

Blip was designed from the ground up to integrate with your MySQL environment. To accomplish that, Blip has two mains points of integration:

Plugins
Plugins are function callbacks that let you override specific functionality of Blip. Every plugin is optional: if specified, it overrides the built-in functionality.
Factories
Factories are interfaces that let you override certain object creation of Blip. Every factory is optional: if specified, it overrides the built-in factory.

Plugins

LoadConfig 

LoadConfig func(Config) (Config, error)

LoadMonitors 

LoadMonitors func(Config) ([]ConfigMonitor, error)

LoadLevelPlans 

LoadLevelPlans func(ConfigPlans) ([]Plan, error)

ModifyDB 

ModifyDB func(*sql.DB)

TransformMetrics 

TransformMetrics func(*Metrics) error
